731065f-b.title: Bridges - Washington Bridge - [High Bridge - Harlem Speedway.]
731065f-b.text:
(1)
Washington Bridge, at Manhattan end, as viewed northward from
High Bridge. The land shown is the Highbridge Park with the Harlem
Speedway skirting the river. This photo is from a reversed negative.
October 1, 1897.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
MAY BE REPRODUCED.
(2)
The opposite side of the Washington Bridge, Manhattan end, as viewed
southward from above High Bridge.
October 1, 1897.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
MAY BE REPRODUCED.
(Not dry mount items).

731073f-a.title: Bridges - Washington Bridge [spans the Harlem River from Manhattan to the Bronx - High Bridge (North).]
731073f-a.text:
Washington Bridge spans the Harlem River from
Manhattan to the Bronx. This view is looking North
from the Eastern end of High Bridge in the Bronx.
About 1920.
Rotogrrph Co.
No Reppoductions.

731069f-a.title: Bridges - Washington Bridge - [High Bridge.]
731069f-a.text:
(1)
View of Washington Bridge, Manhattan end; looking north from High
Bridge; from 181st Street, across Harlem Riyer, to Washington Heights.
Was completed in 1889, at a cost of nearly 42.700.000.
October 1923.
Eugene L. Armbruster, Cellection.
MAY BE REPRODUCED.
(2)
View of Washington Bridge, looking northwest.
October 1923.
Eugene L. Armbruster, Collection.
MAY BE REPRODUCED.
